alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:55AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek at Keiths Mill Road near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek at Keiths Mill Road near Dalton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding expands into the pastures... fields and woodlands upstream and downstream from the Keiths Mill Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 AM EST Wednesday was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.9 feet on 01/04/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 300 PM EST.
